content.question: Which of the following later developments had an effect most similar to that described in the excerpt?

choices.label: The invention of the mechanical reaper in the 1830s
The annexation of Texas in the 1840s
The growth of political party competition in the 1850s
The completion of the first transcontinental railroad in the 1860s

content.answer: The completion of the first transcontinental railroad in the 1860s
